duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and guidance in setting and achieving goals and objectives for the department.
Develop policies, review guidelines, procedures, rules, and regulations.
Coordinate and evaluate program activities, and establish and monitor budgets.
Ensure compliance of degree programs and non-academic departments with annual assessment reporting and updates.
Management of Nuventive Improve through user account maintenance, creation of reports and summaries, and consultation with departments and programs.
Conduct meetings with department chairs to provide feedback on their degree program assessment processes.
Represent the Office of Planning & Assessment on university committees and university events.
Provide support and analysis for the university's upcoming Reaffirmation of Accreditation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in area of expertise or closely related area required. Four years of experience in planning, developing, or implementing programs or research grants.
Master's degree in a closely related area (preferred)
